text:
Excellent service! You can feel the warmth from the team, truly Latin hospitality.
The whole team was fantastic, great food from Colombia and the Caribean. If you want to see and experience a taste of the Latin Culture, this is the place to go. Gracias Raquel for an amazing night!

Awesome place! Celebrated my wife’s birthday here, we had the best time! Wonderfully arranged, delicious food, great music and vibe, and above all excelent service provided by a super friendly and attentive staff! It felt like having a great party with friends at home somewhere in Latin America! Thanks again to Raquel and the rest of Las Americas team for a wonderful night!
Amazing place, amazing food, great music, great team, super good service
Owners wouldn't delist old restaurant (Los Patrones) from food ordering apps. Went there to see a closed restaurant as the owner stated. Wasted my time and my trip. Pretty irresponsible owners.
Its a really awesome place! Great music and nice cozy atmosphere.
